attributes.action: Award A MBE To Snooker Star Mike Hallett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think that snooker legend mike hallett deserves decorating for services to snooker

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
